name: Ni WooCommerce Payment Gateway Charges
author: anzia

sections.description:
Ni WooCommerce Payment Gateway Charges Overview

Easily incorporate additional charges for any payment gateway with the Ni WooCommerce Payment Gateway Charges plugin. Enhance your WooCommerce checkout payment gateways by adding extra fees based on your preferences. This extension supports the addition of extra fees options to WooCommerce payment gateways such as “BACS,” “CHEQUE,” and “COD,” as well as any custom payment gateways integrated into your system.

The extra charge can be calculated as either a “Fixed Amount” or a “Percentage,” depending on your backend settings.

Within the plugin settings, you can enable the “Enable Extra Charges” option to include these additional charges in the overall calculation.

Additionally, the plugin provides an “Extra Charges Option” setting with two choices: “Include Tax” and “Exclude Tax.” If “Include Tax” is selected, the Extra Charge will be added to the cart subtotal, and taxes will be applied accordingly.

Key Features

  • Payemnt gateway report
  • Option to set the fixed or percentage extra charges or fees for each payment gateway.
  • Provide setting option to include or exclude product tax or shipping tax in extra charges or fees.
  • setting option to enable/disable fees or extra charges calculation
  • Extra charges or fees display in order email.
  • Extra charges or fees display in woocommerce admin order

Support/Feedback Email/New Requirement

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins
  • support@naziinfotech.com

Disclaimer

It is not responsible for any harm or wrong doing this Plugin may cause. Users are fully responsible for their own use. This Plugin is to be used WITHOUT warranty.
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin installer or upload files to WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Activate Ni WooCommerce Payment Gateway Charges plugin from admin panel.
  3. Finde Menu Payement in admin.
sections.faq:
Where i can get help?

Click on support tab or email : support@naziinfotech.com

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, as per requirement we can customize this plugin.
